content: this is a legal case currently in progress in the county court karlovac it is the second instance of the case with the first hearing taking place in the municipal court velika gorica the case involves a property dispute between two coowners referred to as am and ss the court has decided to dissolve the coownership of a twobedroom apartment and separate the property the property will be sold through a public auction with the applicant am receiving half of the share obtained from the sale the court has determined the value of the property and used specific legal principles in making their decision the firstinstance court proceedings did not resolve the disagreement on the method of dissolution so the court ordered a valuation and decided on a civil division through registration valuation public auction and satisfaction of the parties the appellant has raised objections to the property valuation and claimed that the division is impossible due to a registered lien but these claims have been addressed and dismissed by the court the court concludes that the petitioner has the right to demand dissolution and litigation is necessary to resolve the division the potential for a future settlement or another litigation does not exclude the petitioners right to dissolution
